Settings.Setting0Tooltip: The equip effect of 'Cabalist's Hymnal' is increased by 5% per AllyFR

Vision of Unending Growth.name: Vision of Unending Growth
Vision of Unending Growth.desc: Rejuvenation has a 2.5% chance to create a new Rejuvenation on a nearby target on tick.

The Dark Titans Lesson.name: The Dark Titans Lesson
The Dark Titans Lesson.desc: You may apply Lifebloom to two targets at once, but your Lifebloom healing is reduced by 10%.

Verdant Infusion.name: Verdant Infusion
Verdant Infusion.desc: Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of HoTs on the target by 8s.

Lycaras Fleeting Glimpse.name: Lycara's Fleeting Glimpse
Lycaras Fleeting Glimpse.desc: Every 45s while in combat, cast a spell based on your form (Wild Growth, Primal Wrath, Starfall, Stampeding Roar).

Memory of the Mother Tree.name: Memory of the Mother Tree
Memory of the Mother Tree.desc: Wild Growth has a 40% chance to cause your next Rejuv or Regrowth to apply to 3 additional allies.

Oath of the Elder Druid.name: Oath of the Elder Druid
Oath of the Elder Druid.desc: Effects of Thick Hide, Astral Influence, Feline Swiftness and Ysera's Gift increased by 75%. Free Heart of the Wild per minute.

Circle of Life and Death.name: Circle of Life and Death
Circle of Life and Death.desc: DoT's deal damage in 25% less time, HoTs in 15% less time.

Of Dusk and Dawn.name: Of Dusk and Dawn
Of Dusk and Dawn.desc: When you reach 5 Holy Power, gain 6% damage and healing for 8 seconds. When you reach 0 Holy Power, gain 3% DR for 10 seconds.

Vanguards Momentum.name: Vanguard's Momentum
Vanguards Momentum.desc: Hammer of Wrath has an extra charge and increases Holy Damage done by 3% for 8s. Stacks 3 times.

The Magistrates Judgment.name: The Magistrate's Judgment
The Magistrates Judgment.desc: Judgment has a 60% chance to reduce the cost of your next Holy Power spender by 60%.
The Magistrates Judgment.droploc: Xav the Unfallen, Theater of Pain

Inflorescence of the Sunwell.name: Inflorescence of the Sunwell
Inflorescence of the Sunwell.desc: Infusion of Light has 1 additional charge and its effects are increased by 20%.

Maraads Dying Breath.name: Maraad's Dying Breath
Maraads Dying Breath.desc: Light of Dawn causes your next Light of the Martyr to also heal your Beacon of Light. Each ally hit by LoD increases Light of the Martyr healing by 10%.

Shadowbreaker, Dawn of the Sun.name: Shadowbreaker, Dawn of the Sun
Shadowbreaker, Dawn of the Sun.desc: Light of Dawns range is increased to 40 yards, and all allies healed receive full effect from your Mastery for 6s.

Shock Barrier.name: Shock Barrier
Shock Barrier.desc: Holy Shock protects the target for 18 seconds, absorbing 20% of it's healing every 6s. Maximum of 5 targets protected at a time.

The Mad Paragon.name: The Mad Paragon
The Mad Paragon.desc: Hammer of Wrath deals 30% additional damage and extends the duration of Wings by 1s.

Relentless Inquisitor.name: Relentless Inquisitor (Retribution)
Relentless Inquisitor.desc: Spending Holy Power grants you 1% haste per finisher for 12 sec, stacking up to 5 times.

Clarity of Mind.name: Clarity of Mind
Clarity of Mind.desc: Spirit Shell increases the duration of active atonements by 3s and reduces mana costs by 30%. During Rapture, PW:S costs 20% less mana and applies 6s longer atonements.

Crystalline Reflection.name: Crystalline Reflection
Crystalline Reflection.desc: Power Word Shield instantly heals the target for 42% SP, and reflects 20% of damage absorbed.

Kiss of Death.name: Kiss of Death
Kiss of Death.desc: Reduces Shadow Word: Death's cooldown by 8s and causes it's damage to trigger atonement when used on targets below 20% health.

The Penitent One.name: The Penitent One
The Penitent One.desc: Power Word: Radiance has a 60% chance to cause your next Penance to be free and fire 3 extra bolts.

Cauterizing Shadows.name: Cauterizing Shadows
Cauterizing Shadows.desc: When Shadow Word: Pain expires on a target, 3 allies within 30 yards of the target are healed.

Measured Contemplation.name: Measured Contemplation
Measured Contemplation.desc: Every 15s that you do not cast Flash Heal / Shadow Mend, the healing of your next Flash Heal / Shadow Mend is increased by 50%. Stacks four times.

Twins of the Sun Priestess.name: Twins of the Sun Priestess
Twins of the Sun Priestess.desc: Power Infusion also grants you 100% of its effects when used on an ally.

Divine Image.name: Divine Image
Divine Image.desc: When you use a Holy Word spell, you have a chance to summon a Naaru to your side. For 15s, the Naaru will cast similar spells to you.

Flash Concentration.name: Flash Concentration
Flash Concentration.desc: Each time you cast Flash Heal, Heal has it's casting time reduced by 0.1s and healing increased by 3%, stacking 5 times.

Harmonious Apparatus.name: Harmonious Apparatus
Harmonious Apparatus.desc: Circle of healing reduces the cooldown on HW: Sanctify, Prayer of Mending reduces the cooldown on HW: Serenity, and Holy Fire reduces the cooldown on HW: Chastise by 4s.

X'anshi, Return of Archbishop Benedictus.name: X'anshi, Return of Archbishop Benedictus
X'anshi, Return of Archbishop Benedictus.desc: After Spirit of Redemption expires, you will revive at up to 100% health, based on your effectiveness during Spirit of Redemption. 10 minute cooldown after reviving.

Vault of Heavens.name: Vault of Heavens
Vault of Heavens.desc: Leap of Faith instead causes you to leap to the target, and has two charges.

Earthen Harmony.name: Earthen Harmony
Earthen Harmony.desc: Earth Shield healing is increased by 150% if your earth shield target is below 75% health, and healing wave adds a stack of Earth Shield to your target.

Jonat's Natural Focus.name: Jonat's Natural Focus
Jonat's Natural Focus.desc: Healing Wave and Healing Surge increase the healing done by your next chain heal by 10%, stacking up to 5 times.

Primal Tide Core.name: Primal Tide Core
Primal Tide Core.desc: Every 4 casts of Riptide also applies Riptide to another friendly target near your Riptide target.

Ancestral Reminder.name: Ancestral Reminder
Ancestral Reminder.desc: Heroism / Bloodlust lasts an extra 20s on you, and you gain an extra 10% haste from it's effect.

Chains of Devastation.name: Chains of Devastation
Chains of Devastation.desc: Casting Chain Heal makes your next Chain Lightning instant cast. Casting Chain Lightning makes your next Chain Heal instant cast.

Deeply Rooted Elements.name: Deeply Rooted Elements
Deeply Rooted Elements.desc: Casting Riptide has a 7% chance to activate Ascendance for 6 seconds.

Spiritwalker's Tidal Totem.name: Spiritwalker's Tidal Totem
Spiritwalker's Tidal Totem.desc: After using Mana Tide Totem, the cast time of Healing Wave and Chain Heal is reduced by 50% and the mana cost by 25% for 10s.

Escape from Reality.name: Escape from Reality
Escape from Reality.desc: After you use Transcendence: Transfer, you can use Transcendence: Transfer again within 10 sec, ignoring its cooldown. During this time, if you cast Vivify on yourself, its healing is increased by 70% and 50% of its cost is refunded.

Invoker's Delight.name: Invoker's Delight
Invoker's Delight.desc: You gain 33% haste for 20 sec after summoning your Celestial.

Roll Out.name: Roll Out
Roll Out.desc: During (Chi Torpedo / Roll), you are immune to roots and snares.

Fatal Touch.name: Fatal Touch
Fatal Touch.desc: Touch of Death cooldown reduced by 120 sec.

Ancient Teachings of the Monastery.name: Ancient Teachings of the Monastery
Ancient Teachings of the Monastery.desc: After casting Essence Font, your Tiger Palm, Blackout Kick, and Rising Sun Kick heal an injured ally within 20 yards for 250% of the damage done. Lasts 15 sec.

Yu'lon's Whisper.name: Yu'lon's Whisper
Yu'lon's Whisper.desc: Activating Thunder Focus Tea causes you to exhale the breath of Yu'lon, healing up to 6 allies within 15 yards over 2 sec.

Clouded Focus.name: Clouded Focus
Clouded Focus.desc: Healing with Enveloping Mists or Vivify while channeling Soothing Mists increases their healing done by 15% and reduces their mana cost by 15%. Stacks up to 3 times. When your Soothing Mists channel ends, this effect is cancelled.

Tear of Morning.name: Tear of Morning
Tear of Morning.desc: Casting Vivify or Enveloping Mist on a target with Renewing Mist has a 10% chance to spread the Renewing Mist to another target. Your Vivify healing through Renewing Mist is increased by 20% and your Enveloping Mist also heals allies with Renewing Mist for 20% of its healing.

Vitality Sacrifice.name: Vitality Sacrifice
Vitality Sacrifice.desc: Taking significant damage from a player or Elite enemy increases your damage and healing by 3% of the damage taken, up to a maximum of 9% for 20 sec. This effect can only occur every 30 sec.

Sephuz's Proclamation.name: Sephuz's Proclamation
Sephuz's Proclamation.desc: Reduce the effectiveness of crowd controlling effects by 10%. Successfully applying a loss of control effect to an enemy, interrupting an enemy, or dispelling any target will increase all your secondary stats by 80 for 15 sec. This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.

Echo of Eonar.name: Echo of Eonar
Echo of Eonar.desc: Your spells and abilities have a low chance to summon a familiar to your side, increasing your healing by 10% for 10s. This effect is duplicated on up to 3 allies at 50% effectiveness, preferring allies with the same role.
